DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the Optimal dose for safety and efficacy in the treatment of cervical dystonia.
DOC.brief_title: Study for Determine the Safety and Efficacy of Clostridium Botulinum Toxin Type A in Subjects With Cervical Dystonia
DOC.criteria: Male or female aged 18~75 Have no clinically significant medical condition Cervical dystonia Pregnant or lactation Subjects who have been administered the following drugs within the previous 1 month
